cards.summary: Use ambulatory blood pressure monitoring to address blood pressure variability.
cards.detail:
{{#patient}}Your recent blood pressure is above your goal and appears to be highly variable, which can indicate a health risk. Please reach out to your care team about ordering ambulatory blood pressure monitoring or obtaining better measurements from home blood pressure monitoring.{{/patient}}
    {{#careTeam}}In adults with suspected blood pressure variability, use Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitoring to better understand risk. If ABPM is not available, discuss more better protocols for home blood pressure monitoring.{{/careTeam}}|[ {"id": "ambulatory-suggestion", "label": "Request Ambulatory Blood Pressure", "type": "suggestion-link", "actions": [{"label":"Click here to request Ambulatory Blood Pressure", "url":"/contact?token=ambulatory-bps"}] } ]|at-most-one|[{"label":"24-hour Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitoring", "url":"https://my.clevelandclinic.org/health/diagnostics/16330-24-hour-ambulatory-blood-pressure-monitoring"}]
